subject: Football
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: The Jets lost to the Colts in the A.F.C. Championship, but the performance of Mark Sanchez, who threw for 257 yards and 2 touchdowns, lends hope for the team’s future.
snippet: The Jets lost to the Colts in the A.F.C. Championship, but the performance of Mark Sanchez, who threw for 257 yards and 2 touchdowns, lends hope for the team’s future.
